title: The Least We Can Do for our Brothers in Palestine is Du'a - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: in the 15o action plan the first seven can be done by any Muslim whether he's rich or poor whether black or white whether Arab or non-arab whether living close to Palestine or far away from Palestine irrespective every Muslim can do the first seven points the balanced eight points from the 15th Point action plan can be done by those people who Allah has given y or have blessed with certain facility but the first seven every individual Muslim can do whether rich or poor whether black or white whether Arab or non-arab whichever part of the world he living in number one the least a Muslim can do is do Dua for our brothers and sisters in Palestine the least we can do is do Dua to Allah subhana wa ta'ala we pray to Allah subhana wa ta'ala that may he give steadfastness to the Palestinians may he give them sa may he Elevate their suffering may he ease things for them may he Grant the those to the people who have been mared make it easy for the family members of those who have been mared the least we can do to Dua
